GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by created date

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing one article

article.title: Seven inspirational thought leaders from Manchester UK
article.author: rogersop
article.body: Who are we kidding, there is only one, and it's Mitch!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments relating to a specified article

comments.body: I carry a log â€” yes. Is it funny to you? It is not to me.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes a comment to be added relating to a specified article and serves the resulting record

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: takes a number of votes to increment in a specified article and serves the resulting record

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: takes a comment ID and removes it from the database

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object relating to a specified username
